func.title: Find_Distance

param.name: x
param.desc: Distance reference point. In local calls, relative to the calling object.

param.name: y
param.desc: Distance reference point. In local calls, relative to the calling object.

func.desc: Search criterion: finds all objects within the specified maximum distance from the specified coordinates. If no coordinates are specified, the position of the calling object is used.
func.remark: For additional information on the use of this function see FindObjects.
